channel.title: Allow wiki to accept Markdown format
channel.description:
It'd make writing wiki articles easier.
Edit: When you guys upgraded the forums/merged forums you forgot to fix the wiki. God damn it Tom.

item.title: Allow wiki to accept Markdown format

item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

/rswiki/ would suit it better. /wiki/ makes me think it’s a wikia about moparscape, when it is not.

Read full topic

item.title: Allow wiki to accept Markdown format
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Cool! It’ll make writing articles easier. Maybe we can also reskin the wiki so that it fits the look of the blog. That’s a lot to ask of though for being such a minor thing, if I knew how I would definitely help out.

Read full topic
item.source: Allow wiki to accept Markdown format

item.title: Allow wiki to accept Markdown format
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:6, topic:540435”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=659292.msg4409216#msg4409216 date=1392989854]
How do you propose we allow the wiki to accept such a format? Is there a plugin or something?
[/quote]http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/

Not a plugin but still pretty simple to use.[/quote]

I’m well aware of markdown, it’s great and easy to use. And if you were going to hack support into mediawiki yourself, you’d use something like this:
http://michelf.ca/projects/php-markdown/
Not the original which was written in perl.

Anyhow, I don’t have the time to hack in support, so I was looking for a plugin. I’ll have a look at Jmood’s links and look into upgrading mediawiki and putting it into a public github repo you guys can edit just like the forum.

edit:

Jmood:

http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:MarkdownExtraGeshiSyntax

That one looks great! Assuming it works

Read full topic
item.source: Allow wiki to accept Markdown format

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:MarkdownSyntax

http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:MarkdownExtraGeshiSyntax

Found two.

Read full topic
